definition: ruthless/fierce/ferocious/determined/to harden (one's heart)/old variant of 很[hen3]

sentences.english: How many times can a man turn his head, and pretending he just doesn't see?
sentences.chinese: 一个人要狠心扭过多少次头，对这一切视若不见？

sentences.english: Julius Erving :Goals determine what you are going to be.
sentences.chinese: 实际上生活就是由那一次次的狠心下决定所构成的。

sentences.english: Raise the feet symbol again to kick to once and perhaps use one a cruel Chuo of the pen my hand up .
sentences.chinese: 再抬起脚象征性踢一下，或者用笔狠心的一戳我手上。

sentences.english: Life is just a series of trying to make up your mind.
sentences.chinese: 实际上生活就是由那一次次的狠心下决定所构成的。

sentences.english: At that time I thought that the father is that cruel-hearted, to work, has thrown down me.
sentences.chinese: 当时我觉得父亲是那么狠心，为了工作，丢下了我。

sentences.english: At last Lord Mountdrago seemed to make an effort.
sentences.chinese: 最后，芝德内哥勋爵似乎下了狠心。

sentences.english: The cruel landlord would bate him no rent.
sentences.chinese: 那个狠心的地主不肯给他减租。

sentences.english: The cruel man abandoned his wife and child.
sentences.chinese: 那个狠心的男人舍弃了妻小。

sentences.english: She fabricated out of these lies because she was stupid and cruel-hearted.
sentences.chinese: 她捏造出这些谎言是因为她既愚蠢又狠心。

sentences.english: Last year, she bought a house hard-hearted.
sentences.chinese: 去年，她狠心买了一套房子。

sentences.english: Small treasure left four seasons, xiao bao cruelly rejected.
sentences.chinese: 四季求小宝留下，小宝都狠心地拒绝了。

sentences.english: It was cruel to shut me up alone without a candle.
sentences.chinese: 多狠心呀，把我一个人关在里面，连支蜡烛也不点。

sentences.english: T. Fuller:Life is just a series of trying to make up your mind.
sentences.chinese: 实际上生活就是由那一次次的狠心下决定所构成的。

sentences.english: Upon seeing the owner, also Heart disgust, cruel to be discarded it.
sentences.chinese: 主人见状，也心生厌恶，狠心地将它丢弃了。

sentences.english: Counterproductive, who is cruel to hurt someone?
sentences.chinese: 缐事与愿违，是谁狠心伤害了谁？

sentences.english: This is the psychology of very many apparently hard-boiled reprobates .
sentences.chinese: 多少表面看来是狠心的浪子，其心理状态就是如此。

definition: to be softhearted/to be tenderhearted/to be kindhearted
to sever all relations with sb/determined/decisive
to have the heart to do sth/to steel oneself to a task
ruthless/fierce/ferocious/determined/to harden (one's heart)/old variant of 很[hen3]
to have a heart of stone/hard-hearted/unfeeling
to hate to do sth/to hate to part with/to begrudge
completely lacking any feeling or sense of justice (idiom); cold and ruthless
to avoid a problem by walking away from it/to quit
